name: MOTHER: Null War (Intro PROTOTYPE)
description:
hi! so i am working on a MOTHER fangame using RPG Maker MV! (though it isnt an RPG game. its mostly a text adventure/novel with music and graphics kinda deal)

i havent yet started with the actual plot and story but i still wanted to show what i managed to do for now, which is some MOTHER staples like the window flavour selection, naming your characters, things like that. i am proud of how they are coming out so i thought i would share my progress even if i havent properly started YET.

manage your expectations since, again, i have not done much yet! just the "introduction" kinda deal.

BY THE WAY:
As much as this is merely a small thing, it is recommended to download the Windows version and play it there, since the one you can play directly on itch.io has worse performance and a small missing feature (the loading animation i made. it threw an error in itch.io that it doesnt in Windows so i took it out)
